desc: Reasonably challenging English-language questions about Liverpool FC covering events, players, and statistics from 2010 to 2025.

questions.prompt: Who was appointed Liverpool manager in October 2015?
Which team did Liverpool defeat in the 2019 UEFA Champions League final?
In which season did Liverpool win their first Premier League title?
Liverpool broke the British transfer record when signing which defender in January 2018?
Did Liverpool finish above Manchester City in the 2021-22 Premier League season? [Yes] or [No]
Which Egyptian forward broke the club record for most Premier League goals in a single season in 2017-18?
Who scored the decisive penalty in the 2022 FA Cup Final shootout against Chelsea?
What is the name of Liverpool's expanded stadium stand that was opened for the 2023-24 season?
Liverpoolâ€™s club captain after Jordan Henderson left in 2023 was?
Did Liverpool win any major trophy in the 2023-24 season? [Yes] or [No]
